name: Core Devs
body: This discount is for Ethereum core developers who either have a Merge pass or are part of the protocol guild

name: OSS Contributors
body:
This discounted ticket is reserved for those who have made at least 2 contributions (since Devcon VI) to any repo under the `efdevcon` or `ethereum` organizations, or any execution/consensus clients.

Execution clients:
- NethermindEth/nethermind, paradigmxyz/reth, hyperledger/besu, ledgerwatch/erigon,- ethereum/go-ethereum

Consensus clients:
- sigp/lighthouse, ChainSafe/lodestar, prysmaticlabs/prysm, Consensys/teku, status-im/nimbus-eth2

name: Public Goods Projects
description: For those who fundraised for Public Goods projects
body:
This discounted ticket is reserved for those who have fundraised for Public Goods projects.

- Clr.fund projects owners on the latest Arbitrum or Devcon Bogota rounds
- Verified Giveth project owners who received at least 1 donation and shared 1 update since Devcon and a quality score of 10 or higher
-Gitcoin Grants Round 20 project owners in Developer Tooling, DApps and Apps, Web3 Infrastructure
- Octant project owners in round 1, 2 and 3

name: DAO Participants
description: Active participation and governing of DAOs
body:
This ticket is reserved for those who have at least an 80% participation rate in a DAO that has 100+ members, has passed at least 3 proposals in the past year, on Mainnet, Optimism, Arbitrum, Base, or Polygon.

Provided by Tally

name: Past Attendees
description: For those who collected the POAP at previous events
body: This ticket is reserved for those who collected the Devconnect Amsterdam, Devcon VI in Bogot√° or Devconnect Istanbul POAP. Thank you for engaging with our attendee activations!
